title: Patriots QB Analysis, Young QBs Wake Up Calls, Players with Biggest Chips on Their Shoulders, International Players, Fantasy Mock Drafts
itunes:title: Patriots QB Analysis, Young QBs Wake Up Calls, Players with Biggest Chips on Their Shoulders, International Players, Fantasy Mock Drafts
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, DeAngelo Hall, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt break down the latest news of the New England Patriots quarterback competition and which other young QBs from around the NFL will have a wake up call in Week 1. Baltimore Ravens center Bradley Bozeman also joins the show for an interview with Kay, DeAngelo Peter and Kyle. The crew discusses which players in the NFL have the biggest chips on their shoulders heading into the season. Former New England Patriots, Kansas City Chiefs and Atlanta Falcons executive Scott Pioli joins the show to discuss the NFL's International Player Pathway Program and more. The hosts tackle the latest news of the day and rundown some of the best fantasy football scenarios ahead of the season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
